task_list.name: scMultipleX Measurements

input_paths.title: Input Paths
input_paths.description: List of input paths where the image data is stored as OME-Zarrs. Should point to the parent folder containing one or many OME-Zarr files, not the actual OME-Zarr file. Example: `["/some/path/"]`. This task only supports a single input path. (standard argument for Fractal tasks, managed by Fractal server).

output_path.title: Output Path
output_path.description: This parameter is not used by this task. (standard argument for Fractal tasks, managed by Fractal server).

component.title: Component
component.description: Path to the OME-Zarr image in the OME-Zarr plate that is processed. Example: `"some_plate.zarr/B/03/0"`. (standard argument for Fractal tasks, managed by Fractal server).

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: dictionary containing metadata about the OME-Zarr. This task requires the following elements to be present in the metadata. `coarsening_xy (int)`: coarsening factor in XY of the downsampling when building the pyramid. (standard argument for Fractal tasks, managed by Fractal server).

label_image.title: Label Image
label_image.description: Name of the label image to use for measurements. Needs to exist in OME-Zarr file

output_table_name.title: Output Table Name
output_table_name.description: Name of the output AnnData table to save the measurements in. A table of this name can't exist yet in the OME-Zarr file

input_channels.title: Input Channels
input_channels.description: Dictionary of channels to measure. Keys are the names that will be added as prefixes to the measurements, values are another dictionary containing either wavelength_id or channel_label information to allow Fractal to find the correct channel (but not both). Example: {"C01": {"wavelength_id": "A01_C01"}. To only measure morphology, provide an empty dict

input_ROI_table.title: Input Roi Table
input_ROI_table.description: Name of the ROI table to loop over. Needs to exists as a ROI table in the OME-Zarr file

level.title: Level
level.description: Resolution of the intensity image to load for measurements. Only tested for level 0

label_level.title: Label Level
label_level.description: Resolution of the label image to load for measurements.

measure_morphology.title: Measure Morphology
measure_morphology.description: Set to True to measure morphology features

allow_duplicate_labels.title: Allow Duplicate Labels
allow_duplicate_labels.description: Set to True to allow saving measurement tables with non-unique label values. Can happen when segmentation is run on a different ROI than the measurements (e.g. segment per well, but measure per FOV)

Channel.title: Channel
Channel.description: A channel which is specified by either `wavelength_id` or `label`.

wavelength_id.title: Wavelength Id
wavelength_id.description: Unique ID for the channel wavelength, e.g. `A01_C01`.

task_list.docs_info:
